resources.string: This is a program that can be used to maintain a shopping list. The main aim of this program is simplicity rather than an abundance of features. It is based on a JavaME app of the same Name. The app has 3 main screens
This is a database of all items you have entered. If checked the item is added to the shopping list and removed if unchecked. To a new item click on the new item button.

Enter the name of the item. Next checkbox lets you list the item as a One time entry. This means if you buy it once and mark it off on the shopping list it is removed from the item list. Click Add item to add and return to item list or Add another to continue adding.
This view shows a list of items that are checked in the item list. After purchasing them, just click on their name to remove them from the list.
